text:
Waterline Data (https://www.waterlinedata.com/) | Mountain View, CA | Full Time

Waterline Data is the Smart Data Catalog company. Our software automatically discovers, organizes, catalogs and raises trusted data above the waterline. Our office is located in Mountain View, CA. Waterline is backed by leading investors. We provide a supportive, friendly, and healthy environment with competitive benefits and perks!

Our stack includes Hadoop, HDFS, Hive, Spark, Solr, Lucene, Java, JAX-RS REST and multiple relational databases on the backend and Angular2 Typescript, Angular Material 2, SCSS on the frontend. We work on all major hadoop distributions like HDP, CDH, MapR and EMR, Google Cloud Dataproc and Azure HDInsight.

We are scaling our engineering team and are looking to hire exceptional talent in the following areas:
